bug.summary: Jupyter notebook pod scheduling fails with 'serviceaccount "default-editor" not found'

Update: my bad, I've used kfctl init $KFAPP without --version=v0.5.0, everything works now. Issue may be closed.

I was able to work around this (I am using kfctl v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6) by creating the service account: kubectl -n kubeflow create serviceaccount default-editor (I had created the jupyter server in the kubeflow namespace)
I'm seeing this in 0.6.2 and command offered by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/doschkinow>@doschkinow</denchmark-link> does work-around the problem. I think this issue should be reopened.
